item.title: Agony of the Cell Phone Shopper
item.description:
Shopping for cell phones the traditional way can be a real pain. Spending hours at carrier stores, dealing with pushy salespeople, and then finding yourself empty-handed and frustrated is not a fun experience. A study by J.D. Power and Associates confirms that dissatisfaction is common, with sales staff, store displays, store facilities, and pricing being the main culprits. And let’s not forget about gas prices! Driving around from store to store in search of the perfect phone can drain your wallet as fast as it drains your patience...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/agony-of-the-cell-phone-shopper/
